statements: UPDATE geofencing_areas SET area_name = 'Main Gate', radius = 100.5 WHERE area_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE GameEvents SET event_name = 'Treasure Hunt', event_description = 'Find the hidden treasure in the park.', area_id = 2 WHERE event_id = 5;

UPDATE player_challenges SET completed = TRUE WHERE player_id = 123 AND challenge_difficulty = 3;

UPDATE events SET event_type = 'New Type', event_description = 'Updated description' WHERE event_id = 5;

UPDATE challenges SET challenge_name = 'Updated Challenge Name', requirements = 'Complete 5 tasks', rewards = '500 coins' WHERE challenge_id = 3;

UPDATE challenges SET rewards = 'Gold Medal' WHERE challenge_id = 10;
UPDATE areas SET area_description = 'New description', area_location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(1 1)') WHERE area_id = 1;
UPDATE players SET player_level = player_level + 1, player_score = player_score + 100 WHERE player_id = 2;

UPDATE players SET player_score = player_score + 100, player_level = player_level + 1 WHERE player_id = 5;
